# decorationItems

**Instance Property**

An array of the decoration items that are anchored to the section, such as background decoration views.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var decorationItems: [NSCollectionLayoutDecorationItem] { get set }
```

## Configuring additional views

- **boundarySupplementaryItems**: An array of the supplementary items that are associated with the boundary edges of the section, such as headers and footers.
